e="preserve">Winston Ntshona (6 October 1941 – 2 August 2018) was a South African playwright and actor. He won a Tony Award for Best Featured Actor in a Play in 1975. He was born in Port Elizabeth, South Africa. Ntshona wrote the 1973 play "The Island". He also wrote "Sizwe Banzi is Dead", which he also co-wrote. Ntshona starred in the play "Full Frontal" at the Royal Court Theatre in London.
Ntshona died on 2 August 2018 from a long-illness in New Brighton, South Africa, aged 76.
